metadata.title: CVE-2021-39711 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In bpf_prog_test_run_skb of test_run.c, there is a possible out of boundsread due to Incorrect Size Value. This could lead to local informationdisclosure with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is notneeded for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-154175781References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
